CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if _InstanceMapService:IsInstance() then self.Entity.Enable = false return end
self._T.textMatchInfoText = self.textMatchInfo.Text self._T.textWaitInfoText = self.textWaitInfo.Text local textMatchInfo = "" if _MatchLogic.minPlayerCnt == _MatchLogic.maxPlayerCnt then if _MatchLogic.minPlayerCnt > 0 then textMatchInfo = string.format("(%d인)", _MatchLogic.minPlayerCnt) end else textMatchInfo = string.format("(%d ~ %d인)", _MatchLogic.minPlayerCnt,_MatchLogic.maxPlayerCnt) end self.textMatchInfo.Text = string.format(self._T.textMatchInfoText,textMatchInfo) self._T.IsReadyWaiting = false
self._T.onClickMatchButton = self.matchButton:ConnectEvent(ButtonClickEvent,function()self:OnClickReadyBtn(true)end) self._T.onClickMatchCancelButton = self.matchCancelButton:ConnectEvent(ButtonClickEvent,function()self:OnClickReadyBtn(false)end) self.textMatchLog.Text = "" self.textMatchLog.Enable = false self.Entity.Enable = not _MatchLogic.isEventMatchType

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnClickReadyBtn
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self._T.IsReadyWaiting == true then --서버 응답 대기중입니다 return end self._T.IsReadyWaiting = true _UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerMatch:SetReady(ready)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnResultReady
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self._T.IsReadyWaiting = false self.matchButton.Enable = not ready self.matchCancelButton.Enable = ready

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleMatchJoin
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local playerId = event.PlayerId local isReady = event.IsReady local playerCnt = event.PlayerCount local matchState = event.MatchState -------------------------------------------------------- if _UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerComponent.UserId == playerId then self:OnResultReady(isReady) end self.textWaitInfo.Text = string.format(self._T.textWaitInfoText, playerCnt)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleMatchLog
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local log = event.Log -------------------------------------------------------- self.textMatchLog.Text = log self.textMatchLog.Enable = not _UtilLogic:IsNilorEmptyString(log)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleMatchState
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local matchState = event.MatchState -------------------------------------------------------- if _MatchLogic.isEventMatchType then if matchState == _MatchEnum.NONE then self:OnClickReadyBtn(false) self.Entity.Enable = false elseif matchState == _MatchEnum.WAIT then self.Entity.Enable = true end end
